title: Interwetten Casino | Recensione onesta di Casino Guru
text:
While their website does list Canada as an option, I seemingly ran into some sort of technical error which prevented me from being able to pass SMS verification.
After a few back-and-forth emails with support, they decided that the problem must be on my end, as they were "..currently not aware of any problems in this regard."
I will email support again after trying other devices, as per their suggestion.
- E-mails to customer service were responded to quicker than expected
- No resolution to my problem
- Can't register
